text: is a retired Japanese women's professional shogi player, ranked 2-dan. ==Personal life== Nakakura's sister, Hiromi, is also a women's professional shogi player. Nakakura is married to professional shogi player Makoto Chūza. The couple married in November 2003, and have three children. ==Promotion history== ==References== ==External links== * 公益社団法人日本女子プロ将棋協会: 所属棋士 * ShogiHub: – * Nakakura's shogi school and blog website: 株式会社いつつ * Category:Japanese shogi players Category:Living people Category:Female professional shogi players Category:LPSA Category:Hosei University alumni Category:Professional shogi players from Tokyo Metropolis Category:People from Fuchū, Tokyo Category:Retired female professional shogi players Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Akiko Nakakura
